column5: The whole house is yours for this cheap price. Yes I know it's a deal :)  Updated 2 bdrm house with a study and essentials. Amazing location 7 to 10 minutes to downtown and University of Houston (central or downtown) by car. Lite-rail access is a 15 min walk as are groceries and restaurants. Medical Center is 25 minutes away by car. Updated photos are available so keep reading.
column8: Private cozy home near downtown and Universities
